title: Sardar Awais condemns Khuzdar School Bus Blast
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 21 (APP):Federal Minister for Power Sardar Awais Ahmed Khan Leghari on Wednesday strongly condemned the bomb blast targeting a school bus by Indian-backed terrorists near Zero Point in Khuzdar.
In an official statement, the minister expressed profound grief over the loss of innocent lives, particularly children, and said that undoubtedly, terrorism against innocent children is an unforgivable act.
The minister said that such heinous acts would not derail Pakistan’s resolve in the fight against terrorism.
“India, after failing to confront us on the battlefield, is now resorting to cowardly tactics by activating its terrorist network,” he added.
He said that the entire nation stands united against such conspiracies. “These attacks are not just heartbreaking; they reflect the desperation of terrorists now on the run,” he added.
